About Deva Sea Food

Quality Without Compromise.

Deva Sea Food is a distinguished Indian exporter of premium seafood, supplying leading importers, distributors, and foodservice brands across global markets.

Inspired by the rich coastal legacy of southern India, we integrate time-honoured harvesting practices with modern processing and preservation technologies. From responsible sourcing through trusted coastal communities to precisely controlled processing, packaging, and cold-chain logistics, every stage is meticulously managed to retain natural flavour, texture, and purity.

Our disciplined, quality-driven approach ensures that every consignment reflects consistency, reliability, and uncompromising international standards. Guided by integrity and excellence, we have built enduring partnerships with clients who value authenticity, trust, and long-term collaboration.

MISSION

To responsibly source, process, and export premium seafood by preserving natural quality, ensuring food safety, and delivering reliable value through precision-driven operations and strong partnerships.

VISION

To be a globally respected exporter of premium seafood, recognized for integrity, consistent quality, and responsible sourcing across international markets.

VALUES

  • Integrity – Ethical, transparent, and accountable in every engagement
  • Quality First – No compromise at any stage of sourcing or processing
  • Responsibility – Sustainable practices that respect oceans and communities
  • Reliability – Consistency our partners can depend on
  • Partnership – Building long-term, trust-based global relationships

Why Choose Deva Sea Food

Trusted by Global Buyers Who Refuse to Compromise

We go beyond supplying seafood—we deliver confidence. Every shipment is backed by disciplined quality systems, ethical sourcing, and a service mindset tuned to the needs of international partners.

Premium Quality

We deliver only the finest pasteurized crab meat and frozen seafood, processed in line with the most stringent global standards for hygiene, microbiological safety, and sensory attributes.

Carefully controlled pasteurization and packing preserve the natural sweetness, texture, and shelf life demanded by high-end buyers.

Ethical Sourcing

Our seafood is responsibly sourced from trusted coastal communities that share our commitment to sustainability and social responsibility.

We prioritise traceable supply chains, fair engagement with fishermen, and practices that protect marine ecosystems for future generations.

Advanced Processing

We employ modern processing lines, controlled environments, and robust cold-chain logistics to lock in freshness, safety, and consistency.

Every batch is handled with precision—from receiving raw material to loading export containers.

Global Reliability

We are trusted by international buyers in Thailand, the United States, Europe, the United Kingdom, and the UAE for consistent quality and on-time delivery.

Robust planning, documentation, and coordination help us align with your schedules and market needs.

Commitment to Excellence

Every product we export reflects our dedication to precision, integrity, and long-term partnerships.

We treat each consignment as a reflection of our brand, our people, and the trust our partners place in us.

Heritage & Expertise

Our operations honour India’s coastal legacy while embracing modern innovation to compete at a global level.

Deep regional knowledge, product specialisation, and evolving expertise come together to create truly world-class seafood offerings.

Products

Focused on Pasteurized Crab Meat & Frozen Seafood

Our portfolio is carefully curated for importers, distributors, and foodservice operators who require consistency, safety, and dependable performance in demanding international markets.

Pasteurized Crab Meat

Premium-grade pasteurized crab meat packed to global specifications—ideal for fine dining, specialty retail, and value-added seafood products.

  • Colossal
  • Jumbo
  • Super Lump
  • Backfin Lump
  • Special
  • Claw

Frozen Fish

A selection of frozen fish products processed under strict temperature control to retain flavour, texture, and food safety.

  • Fillets
  • Fingers
  • WgGs (Whole, Gutted & Graded)
  • Skin-on Fillets

Octopus & Slipper Lobster

In addition to crab and fish, we also supply premium cephalopods and lobster products for specialised applications.

Octopus — Slipper Lobster — Lobster Meat

Quality & Sustainability

Disciplined Systems that Protect Every Shipment

Quality for us is not a single checkpoint—it is a continuous, documented process from the moment raw material is received until cargo is loaded for export. Our teams are trained to follow stringent hygiene protocols, precise temperature control, and thorough inspection procedures.

We work to align with global food safety expectations and customer-specific requirements, ensuring each consignment is shipment-ready, compliant, and dependable.

Process Discipline

Structured SOPs, batch-wise records, and traceability from source to shipment.

Cold-Chain Integrity

Temperature-controlled facilities and logistics that maintain product stability.

Food Safety Focus

Hygiene practices and testing regimes designed around international expectations.

Responsible Practices

Alignment with sustainable sourcing principles and respect for coastal ecosystems.
